publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 39
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa Lidutun üśt́uńa miźmoru David́niń. Ajtamyn saqlajym jollarymny jazyḥly bolmaḥtan tilim byla saqlajym avzumnu avzuḥlap ńegiń- č́a rašaʿ qaršymda.
Tiĺsiź boldum qaryšyp tijiĺdim jaḥšydan da syzlavym č́eĺpalɣan.
Qyzyšty juŕagim ičimd́a śoźĺaǵanimd́a jandy ot ńečik śoźĺadim tilim byla.
Biĺdirgiń maja H učumnu da öĺč́av́uń ḱuńĺarimniń ńedir ol bilajim ńet́eklidir zamanym ḿeniḿ.
Muna tutamlarny kibik b́erdij ḱuńĺarimni da zazalym joḥ ornuna qaršyja t́ek h́eč́tir bar adam turuvču alnyjda śeniń haḿḿeš́a.
T́ek ḱoĺaǵa byla juŕujdir kiši geč́likt́a urunadyrlar yštyra- dyr mal da biĺmejdir kim jomdaryr alarny.
Da haĺegińa ńe umsunamyn e H išanamyn śeńd́adir ol.
Bar tanmaḥlarymdan qutḥarɣyn ḿeni rusvajlyɣyna ńeḱaś adamnyn qojmaɣyn ḿeni.
Tiĺsiź boldum acal- mejmyn avzumnu qačan ki śeń qyldyj bunu.
Ket́argiń ḿeńd́ań ḥastaly- ɣyjny urušundan ḥyššymyjnyn ḿeń tavusuldum.
Üǵut́ĺar byla jazyḥ üč́uń had́eplejsiń kišini da irit́asiń suqlančy gufun t́ek h́ečtir bar adam toḥtavču bu dunjada haḿḿeš́a.
Ešit́kiń tefalamny e H da jalbarmaɣyma qulaḥ salɣyn jasyma tyjylmaɣyn ki ɣarip ḿeń birǵaja očar bolma klejmiń bar atalarym kibik.
Qalɣyn ḿeńd́ań da kipĺańajim baryp da joḥ bolurmyn.

app.note: It seems to be a contracted form of avuzluḥla- ʻto bridleʼ (KRPS 42).

Written as ńetikli. According to KRPS, netekli ʻсколько, каждый раз какʼ can be found in South-Western and Eastern Karaim (422). Cf. ńet́ekli ʻcokolwiek, jakikolwiek, ileʼ in Kowalski’s monograph (1929: 238).
